name: Intelek Training And Consultation (Pty) Ltd
about: Intelek Training and Consultation (Pty) Ltd, based in Boksburg, South Africa, is a South African Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) and TETA approved company specializing in technical training courses. We offer comprehensive Aircraft Maintenance Training programs, including a 30-month Aircraft Mechanical Engineers Apprenticeship that includes theory, practical sessions, and a trade test. Our training is conducted at Rand Airport, Germiston, with a strict full-time schedule to ensure compliance with Civil Aviation Regulations. We also provide Human Factors, Maintenance, and General Familiarization courses. With a global reach, having trained personnel from various airlines, we are committed to delivering world-class technical training. Our students are placed at CAA-approved Maintenance Organizations for on-the-job training, ensuring they gain practical experience. We are dedicated to producing highly skilled aircraft maintenance engineers.
services: ["Air Tractor \nAircraft Avionician Apprentice Training\nAircraft Mechanic Apprentice Training"]
